subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Highlights: The shoreline of Lake Michigan and century-old parks would provide a natural setting for the Games, with the city’s dramatic skyline as the backdrop. Many of the venues are in or near the heart of the city, within walking distance of downtown. President Barack Obama, a longtime Chicago resident, is a high-profile supporter of the bid. Grant Park, site of his presidential acceptance speech, would be a main gathering place during the Olympics.
